title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 910.2 - Designated waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 910.2 - Designated waters

State Regulations

The designated waters are located in the St. Lawrence

River drainage basin within New York State, as outlined on map 1, section
910.7, infra, and as contained
within the topographic limit line shown on the reproduced topographical maps in
section
910.9, infra, excluding the waters
contained within boundaries of State-owned forest preserve
lands. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
910.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
